@Cesus Jhrist
---> "I don't get off to NTR"
---> "what better place to look for than NTR"
Seriously, are you fucking retarded? Can you think up a simple sentence without saying something utterly contradictory and senseless?

Per the comment below, I'll once again recapitulate it because you don't seem to get it.

1. It does NOT matter whether you imagine yourself as a cuck or a cucker, you ARE a cuck due to the fact that you get off to NTR

2. Consent between characters does NOT matter and doesn't influence the above mentioned

3. All premises drawn from the argument "Fiction =/= Reality" are invalid, because
---> NTR is NOT limited to fiction or reality, or one of the above
---> It's based on real life events and circumstances
---> The work is fictional, but the author who created it is NOT.

4. "If you enjoy NTR in ANY way, you're a cuck" is NOT an assumption or premise, it's a fundamental cause and effect, a logical consequence.

If you find yourself enjoying ntr in any way or form seek immediate mental institutionalization. It's the only way short of direct rapid application of lead to the forhead to ensure that your mental derrangement doesn't sully the public view any longer.
